item.title: moodboard
item.dc:creator: dhiraj
item.content:encoded:
[aw2.set module.post_class='{{aw2.get module.slug}}_post' module.post_unique_class='{token}' /] [css.style] .[aw2.get module.post_unique_class/]{ .height-master { display:flex; padding-top: 0.5em; padding-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px; width:100%; border:1px solid #eee; justify-content: center; align-items: center; flex-direction: column; p{ padding: 0 10px; background: #fff; border-radius: 5px; border: 1px solid #ddd; } } .height-master-text { display:flex; padding-top: 0.5em; padding-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px; width:100%; border:1px solid #eee; align-items: center; flex-direction: column; } h5 { margin-top:18px; } .col-centered { display:inline-block; float:none; margin-right:-4px; text-align:left; } } [/css.style]

Moodboard

Background Color Classes

brand-primary-bg

brand-secondary-bg

brand-third-bg

brand-fourth-bg

brand-fifth-bg

brand-sixth-bg

gray-darker-bg

gray-dark-bg

gray-bg

gray-light-bg

gray-lighter-bg

gray-white-bg

brand-success-bg

brand-info-bg

brand-warning-bg

brand-danger-bg

brand-white-bg

brand-black-bg

Text Color Classes

brand-primary

brand-secondary

brand-third

brand-fourth

brand-fifth

brand-sixth

brand-darker

brand-dark

gray

gray-light

gray-lighter

gray-white

brand-success

brand-info

brand-warning

brand-danger

brand-white

brand-black

Typography

Heading 1(h1)

Heading 2(h2)

Heading 3(h3)

Heading 4(h4)

Heading 5(h5)
Heading 6(h6)

Paragrapth text look like this

link text look like this

Fonts Palette

font-size-smallest Font Size =
font-size-smaller Font Size =
font-size-small Font Size =
font-size-base Font Size =
font-size-big Font Size =
font-size-large Font Size =
font-size-larger Font Size =
font-size-largest Font Size =
font-size-huge Font Size =
font-size-jumbo Font Size =
font-size-giant Font Size =

Line height classes

line-height-1 Line Height =
line-height-2 Line Height =
line-height-3 Line Height =
line-height-4 Line Height =
line-height-5 Line Height =
line-height-6 Line Height =
line-height-7 Line Height =
line-height-8 Line Height =
line-height-9 Line Height =
line-height-10 Line Height =

Font Weight classes

font-light Font Weight =
font-regular Font Weight =
font-medium Font Weight =
font-semibold Font Weight =
font-bold Font Weight =
font-ultrabold Font Weight =

Gap classes

[loop.gaps step=1 start=1 stop=10]
gap-[aw2.get gaps.index /]
[/loop.gaps]

Padding classes

[loop.pad start=1 step=1 stop=10]
pad-[aw2.get pad.index /]
pad-x-[aw2.get pad.index /]
pad-y-[aw2.get pad.index /]
[/loop.pad]

Buttons

item.title: echarts
item.dc:creator: amit
item.content:encoded:
option = {
    title : {
        text: 'Tasks Status',
        subtext: 'Counts',
        x:'center'
    },
    tooltip : {
        trigger: 'item',
        formatter: "{a} 
{b} : {c} ({d}%)"
    },
    legend: {
        orient: 'vertical',
        left: 'left',
        data: ['x','y','z','a','b']
    },
    series : [
        {
            name: 'Bingo',
            type: 'pie',
            radius : '55%',
            center: ['50%', '60%'],
            data:[
                {value:335, name:'x'},
                {value:310, name:'y'},
                {value:234, name:'z'},
                {value:135, name:'a'},
                {value:1548, name:'a'}
            ],
            itemStyle: {
                emphasis: {
                    shadowBlur: 10,
                    shadowOffsetX: 0,
                    shadowColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)'
                }
            }
        }
    ]
};
[env.set module.center.new]50%[/env.set] [env.set module.center.new]60%[/env.set] ====
[template.set_array option title.text='Tasks Status' title.subtext= 'Counts' title.x='center' /] [template.set main="option.backgroundColor"]#ffffff[/template.set] [template.set_array option tooltip.trigger='item' /] [template.set option.tooltip.formatter]{a}
{b} : {c} ({d}%)[/template.set] [template.set data="x,y,z,a,b" /] [template.set_array option legend.orient='vertical' legend.left= 'left' legend.data= '{template.data.comma}' /] [template.set_array option.series.new name='Bingo' type='pie' radius='55%' /] [template.set option.series.last.center.new]55%[/template.set] [template.set option.series.last.center.new]60%[/template.set] [template.set_array option.series.last.data.new value='335' name='x' /] [template.set main="option.series.last.data.last.itemStyle.normal.color"]#ffeeff[/template.set] [template.set_array option.series.last.data.new value='310' name='y' /] [template.set main="option.series.last.data.last.itemStyle.normal.color"]#ff00ff[/template.set] [template.set_array option.series.last.data.new value='235' name='z' /] [template.set main="option.series.last.data.last.itemStyle.normal.color"]#0000ff[/template.set] [template.set main='option.itemStyle.emphasis.shadowBlur']10[/template.set] [template.set main='option.itemStyle.emphasis.shadowOffsetX']0[/template.set] [template.set main='option.itemStyle.emphasis.shadowColor']rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)[/template.set] [env.dump template.option /] [env.dump template.option.json_encode /]
====== 
option = {
    title : {
        text: '南丁格尔玫瑰图',
        subtext: '纯属虚构',
        x:'center'
    },
    tooltip : {
        trigger: 'item',
        formatter: "{a} 
{b} : {c} ({d}%)"
    },
    legend: {
        x : 'center',
        y : 'bottom',
        data:['rose1','rose2','rose3','rose4','rose5','rose6','rose7','rose8']
    },
    toolbox: {
        show : true,
        feature : {
            mark : {show: true},
            dataView : {show: true, readOnly: false},
            magicType : {
                show: true,
                type: ['pie', 'funnel']
            },
            restore : {show: true},
            saveAsImage : {show: true}
        }
    },
    calculable : true,
    series : [
        {
            name:'半径模式',
            type:'pie',
            radius : [20, 110],
            center : ['25%', '50%'],
            roseType : 'radius',
            label: {
                normal: {
                    show: false
                },
                emphasis: {
                    show: true
                }
            },
            lableLine: {
                normal: {
                    show: false
                },
                emphasis: {
                    show: true
                }
            },
            data:[
                {value:9, name:'rose1'},
                {value:3, name:'rose2'},
                {value:4, name:'rose3'},
                {value:1, name:'rose4'},
                {value:0, name:'rose5'}
            ]
        },
        {
            name:'面积模式',
            type:'pie',
            radius : [30, 110],
            center : ['75%', '50%'],
            roseType : 'area',
            data:[
                {value:9, name:'rose1'},
                {value:3, name:'rose2'},
                {value:4, name:'rose3'},
                {value:1, name:'rose4'},
                {value:0, name:'rose5'}
            ]
        }
    ]
};
====

{b} : {c} ({d}%)[/template.set] [template.set data="'rose1','rose2','rose3','rose4','rose5','rose6','rose7','rose8'" /] [template.set_array option2 legend.x='center' legend.y= 'bottom' legend.data= '{template.data.comma}' /] [template.set_array option2 toolbox.show='true' toolbox.feature.mark.show='true' toolbox.feature.restore.show='true' /] [template.set [template.set main="option2.series.last.data.last.itemStyle.normal.color"]#ffeeff[/template.set] [template.set_array option2.series.last.data.new value='310' name='rose2y' /] [template.set option = {
    tooltip: {
        trigger: 'item',
        formatter: "{a} 
{b}: {c} ({d}%)"
    },
    legend: {
        orient: 'vertical',
        x: 'left',
        data:['x','y','z','a','b']
    },
    series: [
        {
            name:'bingo',
            type:'pie',
            radius: ['50%', '70%'],
            avoidLabelOverlap: true,
            label: {
                normal: {
                    show: false,
                    position: 'center'
                },
                emphasis: {
                    show: true,
                    textStyle: {
                        fontSize: '30',
                        fontWeight: 'bold'
                    }
                }
            },
            labelLine: {
                normal: {
                    show: false
                }
            },
            data:[
                {value:335, name:'x'},
                {value:310, name:'y'},
                {value:234, name:'z'},
                {value:135, name:'a'},
                {value:1548, name:'b'}
            ]
        }
    ]
};



app.title = '嵌套环形图';

option = {
    tooltip: {
        trigger: 'item',
        formatter: "{a} 
{b}: {c} ({d}%)"
    },
    legend: {
        orient: 'vertical',
        x: 'left',
        data:['a','b','c','d','e','f','g','h','I','j']
    },
    series: [
        {
            name:'Inner',
            type:'pie',
            selectedMode: 'single',
            radius: [0, '30%'],

            label: {
                normal: {
                    position: 'inner'
                }
            },
            labelLine: {
                normal: {
                    show: false
                }
            },
            data:[
                {value:335, name:'I', selected:true},
                {value:679, name:'j'},
                {value:1548, name:'h'}
            ]
        },
        {
            name:'Outer',
            type:'pie',
            radius: ['40%', '55%'],
            avoidLabelOverlap:true,
            label: {
                normal: {
                    formatter: '{a|{a}}{abg|}\n{hr|}\n  {b|{b}：}{c}  {per|{d}%}  ',
                    backgroundColor: '#eee',
                    borderColor: '#aaa',
                    borderWidth: 1,
                    borderRadius: 4,
                     shadowBlur:3,
                     shadowOffsetX: 2,
                     shadowOffsetY: 2,
                     shadowColor: '#999',
                     padding: [0, 7],
                    rich: {
                        a: {
                            color: '#999',
                            lineHeight: 22,
                            align: 'center'
                        },
                        // abg: {
                        //     backgroundColor: '#333',
                        //     width: '100%',
                        //     align: 'right',
                        //     height: 22,
                        //     borderRadius: [4, 4, 0, 0]
                        // },
                        hr: {
                            borderColor: '#aaa',
                            width: '100%',
                            borderWidth: 0.5,
                            height: 0
                        },
                        b: {
                            fontSize: 16,
                            lineHeight: 33
                        },
                        per: {
                            color: '#eee',
                            backgroundColor: '#334455',
                            padding: [2, 4],
                            borderRadius: 2
                        }
                    }
                }
            },
            data:[
                {value:335, name:'a'},
                {value:310, name:'b'},
                {value:234, name:'c'},
                {value:135, name:'d'},
                {value:1048, name:'e'},
                {value:251, name:'f'},
                {value:147, name:'g'},
                {value:102, name:'h'}
            ]
        }
    ]
};

item.title: delete-revisions
item.dc:creator: amit
item.content:encoded: [templates.add main] [mysqli.fetch.rows o.set=template.rows] SELECT ID FROM `wp_posts` where post_type ='revision' and date(post_modified)<date('20191101') limit 10000; [/mysqli.fetch.rows] [loop.@x template.rows.rows] [mysqli.multi.cud o.set=template.ack] set session transaction isolation level read uncommitted; delete from wp_posts where ID = '[env.@x.item.ID /]' and post_type ='revision' and date(post_modified)<date('20191101'); delete from wp_postmeta where post_id = (select ID from wp_posts where ID = '[env.@x.item.ID /]' and post_type ='revision' and date(post_modified)<date('20191101')); [/mysqli.multi.cud] [/loop.@x] [template.rows.echo /] [/templates.add]

item.title: aw editor
item.dc:creator: amit

item.title: moodboard
item.dc:creator: sapna
item.content:encoded: [aw2.module slug="moodboard" /]

item.title: excel-test
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.content:encoded:
[module.set filepath='/var/www/html/prods-import.xls' /] [excel.info file_path='{module.filepath}' set='module.total_rows'/] [excel.read_header filename='{module.filepath}' set='module.header_info' /]
[module.dump header_info /] [module.dump total_rows ignore=true/] [env.dump module.total_rows ignore=true/]
[excel.file_reader file_path='{module.filepath}' start_from='0' limit='10' set='parsed.data' /]
[int.create 1 o.set='module.xl_data.pageno' /] [env.get parsed.data m.arr_item='s:first' o.set="module.xl_data.header" /] [module.set_array xl_data rows='{parsed.data}' /]
[env.dump parsed.data ignore=true /] [loop.@a parsed.data] [aw2.get @a.item dump=true ignore=true/] [/loop.@a]
[module.dump xl_data ignore=true /] [excel.write_bulk data='module.xl_data' file_name='/var/www/html/bulk-write.xlsx' file_format='Xls' ignore=true /] [excel.dataset_write dataset='{module.xl_data}' file_name='/var/www/html/bulk-write-dataset.xls' file_format='Xls' /] [excel.write_bulk_csv data='module.xl_data' file_name='/var/www/html/bulk-write-dataset.csv' file_format='csv' /]

item.title: arrays
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main]

Arrays in Awesome Enterprise

Array Delaration 
    Type 1:
    
       0 => 'Fitst Name'
       1 => 'Last Name'
       2 => 'email_id'
[template.set_array type_1 new="first_name"/] [template.set_array type_1 new="last_name"/] [template.set_array type_1 new="email_id"/] [template.type_1.dump/] 
    Type 2 :
    
      'first_name'=>'amit'
      'last_name'=>'singh'
      'email_id'=>'sample@sample.com'
[template.set_array type_2 first_name="amit" last_name="singh" email_id="sample@sample.com"/] [template.type_2.dump/] 
    Type 3 :
    
      0 => array(
            fitst_name => 'amit',
            last_name  => 'singh',
            email_id   => 'amit@sample.com'
            )
      1 = > array(
            fitst_name => 'ravi',
          	fitst_name  => 'singh',
            email_id   => 'ravi@sample.com'
            )
[template.set_array type_3.new first_name="amit" last_name="singh" email_id="amit@sample.com"/] [template.set_array type_3.new FIRST_NAMEEEEEEE="ravi" last_name="singh" email_id="ravi@sample.com"/] [template.type_3.dump/] 
    Type 4 :
    
      'FirstName=>'Amit',
      'LastName'=>'Singh'
[template.set_array type_4] [FirstName]Amit[/FirstName] [LastName]Singh[/LastName] [email_id _value="sample@sample.com"/] [contact] [number new mobile_number="123" landline_number='456'][/number] [addr new addr_line1="addr1" addr_line2='addr2'][/addr] [/contact] [/template.set_array] [template.type_4.dump/] [arr.create o.set=template.type_5] [number new mobile_number="123" landline_number='456'][/number] [/arr.create] [template.type_5.dump/] [/templates.add]

item.title: forms-sample
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main]
[session_ticket.create o.set=template.ticket/] [session_ticket.set_activity {template.ticket} app='{app.slug}' module='{module.slug}.submit' /]

Contact Us

//** Load form fields according to steps **// [form_control2.text id="full_name" label="Full Name" required=yes plcaceholder="Full Name" /] [form_control2.email id="email_id" label="Email Id" placeholder="Email Id" required=yes /] [form_control2.textarea id="comment" label="Comment" placeholder="Comment" required=yes /] [form_control2.button type="submit" value=' Submit Details' /]
[/templates.add] [templates.add submit] [template.set req={request2} /] [template.echo /] [/templates.add]

item.title: if-checks
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main]

If Condition Demo

    [if.equal lhs="india" rhs="india"]
  1. india is equal to india
    2. [/if.equal] [if.equal lhs="india" rhs="INDIA"]
  2. india is equal to INDIA
    3. [/if.equal] [if.else]
  3. india is not equal to INDIA
    4. [/if.else] [template.set str_1="india" str_2="india" str_3="india" str_4="india"/] [if.equal lhs='{template.str_1}' rhs='{template.str_2}'] [/if.equal] [if.and lhs='{template.str_3}' equal='{template.str_4}']
  4. If and works
    5. [/if.and] [if.else]
  5. If and fails
    6. [/if.else] [template.set str_1="indiaAA" str_2="in" str_3="india" str_4="india"/] [if.equal lhs='{template.str_1}' rhs='{template.str_2}'] [/if.equal] [if.or lhs='{template.str_3}' equal='{template.str_4}']
  6. If or works
    7. [/if.or] [if.else]
  7. If or fails
    8. [/if.else] [if.not_equal lhs="india" rhs="US"]
  8. india is not_equal to US
    9. [/if.not_equal] [if.greater_equal lhs="14" rhs="14"]
  9. 14 is greater_equal to 14
    10. [/if.greater_equal] [if.greater_than lhs="14" rhs="10"]
  10. 14 is greater_than to 10
    11. [/if.greater_than] [if.less_equal lhs="10" rhs="10"]
  11. 10 is less_equal to 10
    12. [/if.less_equal] [if.less_than lhs="9" rhs="10"]
  12. 9 is less_than to 10
    13. [/if.less_than] [if.whitespace Hello world]
  13. whitespace found
    14. [/if.whitespace] [template.set not_whitespace_str="Helloworld" /] [if.not_whitespace template.not_whitespace_str]
  14. whitespace not found
    15. [/if.not_whitespace] [template.set str_no="no" /] [if.no template.str_no]
  15. string value is no
    16. [/if.no] [template.set str_yes="yes" /] [if.yes template.str_yes]
  16. string value is yes
    17. [/if.yes] [if.not_empty template.str_yes]
  17. [template.str_yes/] : this string is not empty
    18. [/if.not_empty] [if.empty template.test]
  18. THis string is empty
    19. [/if.empty] [template.set odd_num=3/] [if.odd template.odd_num]
  19. 3 is odd
    20. [/if.odd] [if.even 12]
  20. 12 is even
    21. [/if.even] [if.user_can administrator]
  21. I am admin
    22. [/if.user_can] [if.user_cannot Management]
  22. I Dont have access of Management
    23. [/if.user_cannot] [if.logged_in]
  23. I am logged in
    24. [/if.logged_in] [if.not_logged_in]
  24. I am not logged in
    25. [/if.not_logged_in] [/templates.add]

item.title: if-checks-datatype
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main]

Datatype checks

//**array**// [template.set_array ack new="jan"/] [template.set_array ack new="feb"/] [template.set_array ack new="mar"/] //**string**// [template.set str_var="My string"/] //**int**// [int.create 12 o.set=template.int_num/] //**Num**// [num.create 13.45 o.set=template.num/] [template.dump/]
    //**Array check**// [if.arr template.ack]
  1. It is array
    2. [/if.arr] [if.not_arr template.str_var]
  2. [template.str_var/] is not array
    3. [/if.not_arr] //**integer check**// [if.int template.int_num]
  3. [template.int_num/] is integer
    4. [/if.int] [if.not_int template.str_var]
  4. [template.str_var/] It is not integer
    5. [/if.not_int] //**string check**// [if.str template.str_var]
  5. [template.get str_var /] It is string
    6. [/if.str] [if.not_str template.int_num]
  6. [template.int_num/] It is not string
    7. [/if.not_str] //**number check**// [if.num template.num]
  7. [template.num/] It is number
    8. [/if.num] [if.not_num template.str_var]
  8. [template.str_var/] It is not number
    9. [/if.not_num] [if.not_date_obj template.str_var]
  9. [template.str_var/] is not date
    10. [/if.not_date_obj] //**Check the single value in array**// [if.contains needle="jan" haystack={template.ack}]
  10. jan found
    11. [/if.contains] [if.not_contains needle="dec" haystack={template.ack}]
  11. Dec not found
    12. [/if.not_contains] //**Check the single value in comma seperated string**// [if.contains needle="feb" haystack="s:jan,feb,mar,apr"]
  12. Feb found
    13. [/if.contains] [if.not_contains needle="aug" haystack="s:jan,feb,mar,apr"]
  13. aug not found
    14. [/if.not_contains]
[/templates.add]

item.title: loops-sample
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main] //***Simple array**// [template.set_array names new="Amit"/] [template.set_array names new="Ravi"/] [template.set_array names new="Raju"/] [template.set_array names new="Ramesh"/] [template.names.count.echo /] [loop.@name template.names] NEW VALUE: [env.get @name.item/]
[/loop.@name] //**Nested array**// [template.set_array users.new first_name="Amit" last_name="Singh" /] [template.set_array users.new first_name="Ravi" last_name="Kumar" /] [template.set_array users.new first_name="Ramesh" last_name="soni" /] USers count [template.get users.count /] [loop.@user template.users] [env.@user.dump/] First Name : [env.get @user.item.first_name/]
Odd : [env.get @user.odd/]
Even : [env.get @user.even/]
[/loop.@user] //**Some advance concepts in loop**// [template.set_array month new="Jan"/] [template.set_array month new="Feb"/] [template.set_array month new="March"/] [template.set_array days new="1" /] [template.set_array days new="2" /] [template.set_array days new="3" /] [template.set_array days new="4" /] [template.set_array days new="5" /] //**First**// [loop.@m template.month] Month : [env.get @m.item/] [loop.@d template.days] Day : - [env.get @d.item/]
[/loop.@d]
[/loop.@m] [loop.@i start="1" stop=10 step=1] [if.true @i.odd] ODD :: [env.get @i.item] [/if.true]
[if.true @i.even] Even :: [env.get @i.item] [/if.true]

[if.true i.first]I am first [aw2.get i.item /][/if.true]
[if.true i.last]I am last [aw2.get i.item /][/if.true] [/loop.@i] [template.dump/] [loop.i module.x] [loop.j module.y]
i am inside j i is: [aw2.get i.item /] j is [aw2.get j.item /]
[/loop.j] [/loop.i] [/templates.add]

item.title: post-builder
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main]
[query.posts_builder part=start] { "posts_per_page": "-1", "post_type": "testimonials", "post_status": "publish", "order": "ASC", "orderby": "date" } [/query.posts_builder] [query.posts_builder part=meta_query] { "key": "testimonial_author", "value": "test author 2", "compare": "=" } [/query.posts_builder] [query.posts_builder part=tax_query] { "taxonomy": "testimonial_type", "field": "slug", "terms": "test-1" } [/query.posts_builder]
[query.posts_builder part=run set="template.result" /] [template.result.dump /]
[/templates.add]

item.title: modifier-samples
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main] [module.set str_a='I Passed the test. test is example' str_test='i failed the test' date="2018-10-02" number="142344" math_test="6*44" slashes="\ I am ' \" tags="Bold tag"/] [arr.set module.arrset a="hi" b="there" c="hello"/] [module.dump /]

  1. modifier lower m.lower

    • [module.str_a m.lower='yes' /]
    • [module.str_test m.lower='yes' /]

  2. modifier upper m.upper

    • [module.str_a m.upper='yes' /]
    • [module.str_test m.upper='yes' /]

  3. modifier capitalize m.capitalize

    • [module.str_a m.capitalize='yes' /]
    • [module.str_test m.capitalize='yes' /]

  4. modifier sentence m.sentence

    • [module.str_a m.sentence='yes' /]
    • [module.str_test m.sentence='yes' /]

  5. modifier trim m.trim

    • [module.str_a m.trim='yes' /]
    • [module.str_test m.trim='yes' /]

  6. modifier ltrim m.ltrim

    • [module.str_a m.ltrim='yes' /]
    • [module.str_test m.ltrim='yes' /]

  7. modifier rtrim m.rtrim

    • [module.str_a m.rtrim='yes' /]
    • [module.str_test m.rtrim='yes' /]

  8. modifier left m.left

    • [module.str_a m.left='n:3' /]
    • [module.str_test m.left='n:3' /]

  9. modifier right m.right

    • [module.str_a m.right='n:10' /]
    • [module.str_test m.right='n:10' /]

  10. modifier substring m.substr='yes' m.start='n:10' m.chars='n:5'

    • [module.str_a m.substr='yes' m.start='n:10' m.chars='n:5' /]
    • [module.str_test m.substr='yes' m.start='n:4' m.chars='n:5' /]

  11. modifier length m.length

    • [module.str_a m.length='yes' /]
    • [module.arrset m.length='yes' /]

  12. modifier create array m.json_encode

    • [module.arrset m.json_encode='yes' /]

  13. modifier make json m.json_decode

    • [module.arrset m.json_encode='yes' m2.json_decode="yes" o.set=module.modified_arr/]
    [module.modified_arr.dump /]

  14. modifier Remove slashes m.stripslashes_deep

    • [module.slashes m.stripslashes_deep='yes' /]

  15. modifier remove tags m.strip_tags

    • [module.tags m.strip_tags='yes' /]

  16. modifier encode/decode m.encrypt='yes' m.decrypt='yes'

    • [module.str_test m.encrypt='yes' o.set='module.enc' /] [module.enc m.decrypt='yes' /]
==================================================================================== 
  [[module.x m.explode_on='yes']] -> on comma
  [[module.x m.explode_on='s:comma']] -> on comma
  [[module.x m.explode_on='s:space']] -> on space
  [[module.x m.explode_on='s:dot']] -> on dot
  [[module.x m.explode_on='s:.']] -> on character
  
  [[module.str_test m.explode_on='s:space' o.set="module.explode" /]] - [module.str_test m.explode_on='s:space' o.set="module.explode" /] [module.dump explode/]
==================================================================================== 
  [[module.x m.implode_on='yes']] -> on comma
  [[module.x m.implode_on='s:comma']] -> on comma
  [[module.x m.explode_on='s:quote_comma']] -> on quote_comma
  [[module.x m.implode_on='s:space']] -> on space
  [[module.x m.implode_on='s:dot']] -> on dot
  [[module.x m.implode_on='s:.']] -> on character
  
  [[module.explode m.implode_on='s:quote_comma' /]] - [module.explode m.implode_on='s:quote_comma'/]
==================================================================================== 
  
  [[module.number m.to_num m2.number_format='yes' m2.decimals='n:2' /]] - [module.number m.to_num m2.number_format='yes' m2.decimals='n:2'/]
==================================================================================== 
  
  [[module.date m.date_format='yes' /]] - Default format is 'M d, Y' - [module.date m.date_format='yes'/] 
  [[module.date m.date_format='M y' /]] - [module.date m.date_format='M y'/]
==================================================================================== 
  
  [[module.str_test m.words='yes' /]] - Default returns all words - [module.str_test m.words='yes'/] 
  [[module.str_test m.words='n:3' /]] - [module.str_test m.words='n:3'/]
==================================================================================== 
  [[module.str_test m.url_encode='yes' o.set="module.url_encode" /]] - [module.str_test m.url_encode='yes' o.set="module.url_encode"/]  [module.url_encode /]
==================================================================================== 
  [[module.url_encode m.url_decode='yes' /]] - [module.url_encode m.url_decode='yes'/]
==================================================================================== 
  [[module.arrset /]] - [module.dump arrset /]
  [[module.arrset m.arr_item='s:first' /]] - [module.arrset m.arr_item='s:first' /]
  [[module.arrset m.arr_item='s:c' /]] - [module.arrset m.arr_item='s:c' /]
  [[module.arrset m.arr_item='s:last' /]] - [module.arrset m.arr_item='s:last' /]
  [[module.arrset m.arr_item='n:1' /]] - [module.arrset m.arr_item='n:1' /]
==================================================================================== 
  [[module.arrset m.shuffle='yes' o.set="module.shuffled" /]] - [module.arrset m.shuffle='yes' o.set="module.shuffled" /] [module.dump shuffled /]
==================================================================================== 
  [[module.str_test m.entities_encode='yes' /]] - [module.str_test m.entities_encode='yes' /]
==================================================================================== 
  [[module.str_test m.entities_decode='yes' /]] - [module.str_test m.entities_decode='yes' /]
==================================================================================== 
  [[module.str_test m.esc_sql='yes' /]] - [module.str_test m.esc_sql='yes' /]
==================================================================================== 
  [[module.math_test m.solve='yes' /]] - [module.math_test m.solve='yes' /]
==================================================================================== 
  [[module.str_test m.to_str='yes' /]] - [module.str_test m.to_str='yes' /]
==================================================================================== 
  [[module.number m.to_num='yes' /]] - [module.number m.to_num='yes' /]
==================================================================================== 
  [[module.number m.to_int='yes' /]] - [module.number m.to_int='yes' /]
==================================================================================== 
  [[module.number m.to_bool='yes' /]] - [module.number m.to_bool='yes' /]
====================================================================================

  1. modifier run m.run

    • [module.str_a m.run='yes' /]
    • [module.str_test m.run='yes' /]
  2. Additional

    modifier the_content m.the_content the content filter

    • [module.str_a m.the_content='yes' /]
    • [module.str_test m.the_content='yes' /]

  3. modifier do_shortcode m.do_shortcode

    • [module.str_a m.do_shortcode='yes' /]
    • [module.str_test m.do_shortcode='yes' /]
[/templates.add]

item.title: variable-scope-samples
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main] //** Template Level variable **// [template.set t1="Template Level variable" /] //** module level variable **// [module.set m1="module Level variable" /] //** environment level variable **// [env.set e1="env Level variable" /] //** user defined/custom scope **// [do.@sample] [env.set @sample.s1="user defined scope" /] [env.@sample.s1/] [/do.@sample]
Template Level variable : [template.t1/]
user defined/custom scope?????? : [env.@sample.s1/] [templates.new_template /] [/templates.add] [templates.add new_template]
module level variable : [module.m1 /]
Template Level variable (This will not generate any output) ???? : [template.t1 /]
environment level variables :[env.e1 /] [/templates.add]

item.title: output-checks
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.content:encoded:
[[module.set  str_a='   I Passed the test    '/]]
  [module.set  str_a='   I Passed the test    '/]

  [[arr.set module.arrset a="hi" b="there" c="hello"/]]
  [arr.set module.arrset a="hi" b="there" c="hello"/]
  [[arr.set module.newarr d="Hope" e="is there"/]]
  [arr.set module.newarr d="Hope" e="is there"/]
  [[module.arrset /]] - [module.dump arrset /]
==================================================================================== 
  [[module.arrset m.shuffle='yes' o.exit="yes" /]] - Dump the value and exit
==================================================================================== 
  [[module.arrset m.shuffle='yes' o.die="yes" /]] - Dump the value and die
==================================================================================== 
  [[module.str_a o.echo="yes" /]] - Echo the value [module.str_a o.echo="yes" /]
==================================================================================== 
  [[module.str_a o.dump="yes" /]] - [module.str_a o.dump="yes" /]
==================================================================================== 
  [[module.str_a o.console="yes" /]] - [module.str_a o.console="yes" /]
==================================================================================== 
  [[module.str_a o.log="yes" /]] - [module.str_a o.log="yes" /]
  [[module.str_a o.log="temp-log.html" /]] - [module.str_a o.log="temp-log.html" /]
==================================================================================== 
  [[module.str_a o.destroy="yes" /]] - [module.str_a o.destroy="yes" /]
==================================================================================== 
  [[module.arrset m.shuffle='yes' o.console="yes" o2.set="module.shuffled" /]] - [module.arrset m.shuffle='yes' o.console="yes" o2.set="module.shuffled" /] [module.dump shuffled /]
==================================================================================== 
  [[module.newarr o.merge_with='module.arrset' /]] - [module.newarr o.merge_with='module.arrset' /] [module.dump arrset /]
====================================================================================

item.title: do-checks
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add another_search] [do.@search] 
    do within do
    [env.dump handlers /]
[@search.dump /] [/do.@search] 
  search should still be there
    [env.dump handlers /]
[/templates.add] [do.@search] 
  checking for registered service
  [env.dump handlers /]
hello dolly [@search.set x=hero /] [@search.set_array a x=1 y=2 z=3 /] [@search.x /] [@search.dump /] [templates.another_search /] [/do.@search] now search does not exist [aw2.get @search.dump /] now search service does not exist [env.dump handlers /] [do.ss] [php.mt_rand p1=1000 p2=999999 set=ss.otp /] //** expiry time **// [date.create "+30 minutes" date_format='Y-m-d H:i:s' set=ss.expiry /] hello:[aw2.get ss.otp /] [aw2.get ss.dump /] [/do.ss]

item.title: content-checks

item.content:encoded:
[content.get] hello [request.get x /] [/content.get]
[content.run] hello [request.get x /] [/content.run]

item.title: condition-checks
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main] [env.dump /]

Chains

  [[module.set lapp_id=5000 /]]

  c.param=module.lapp_id  will return '5000'
  c.param=s:{module.lapp_id}  will return '5000'
  c.param=n:{module.lapp_id}  will return 5000.00
  c.param=i:{module.lapp_id}  will return 5000
  c.param=b:{module.lapp_id}  will return true

  c.param=s:5	will return '5'
  c.param=s:	will return ''

  c.param=n:5	will return 5.00
  c.param=n:	will return 0

  c.param=i:5	will return 5.00
  c.param=i:hello	will return 0

  c.param=b:5	will return true
  c.param=b:true	will return true

  c.param=b:0	will return false
  c.param=b:false	will return false
  c.param=b:	will return false
[str.create 5000 o.set=module.lapp_id /] [str.create hello o.set=module.x_str /] [str.create main=' ' o.set=module.whitespaces /] [int.create 6250 o.set=module.int_even /] [num.create 123.00 o.set=module.num_odd /] [bool.create true o.set=module.y_bool /] [module.dump /] [module.set str1=5 str2=hello str3=7.01 str4=true /] [module.str1 m.to_int=yes o.set=module.new_int /] [module.str2 m.to_str=yes o.set=module.new_str /] [module.str3 m.to_num=yes o.set=module.new_num /] [module.str4 m.to_bool=yes o.set=module.new_bool /] [module.set success='I suceeded' failed='I failed' /] [module.dump /] 
  [[arr.set module.arrset a={module.x_str} b={module.y_bool} c="hello"/]]
  [arr.set module.arrset a={module.x_str} b={module.y_bool} c="hello"/]
  [[module.arrset /]] - [module.dump arrset /]

  [[env.echo c.ignore='yes' /]]
  [env.echo c.ignore='yes' /]
[module.dump /]

Odd/Even Tests(Int Check - Casted to Int)

[[module.success c.even=module.int_even/]]
Result:[module.success c.even=module.int_even/] Result:[module.success c.even=i:{module.int_even}/] Result:[module.success c.even=i:50 /]

[[module.success c.odd=module.int_even /]]
Result:[module.success c.odd=module.int_even/]

Comparison Tests(Strict Check - Value and Datatype check)

[[module.success c.cond="module.num_odd" c.eq="n:123"/]]
Result:[module.success c.cond="module.num_odd" c.eq="n:123" /]

[[module.success c.cond="module.num_odd" c.neq="n:1123"/]]
Result:[module.success c.cond="module.num_odd" c.neq="n:1123"/]

[[module.success c.cond="module.int_even" c.gt="n:112"/]]
Result:[module.success c.cond="module.int_even" c.gt="n:112"/]

[[module.success c.cond="module.lapp_id" c.lt="s:{module.int_even}"/]]
Result(String Comparison):[module.success c.cond="module.lapp_id" c.lt="s:{module.int_even}"/]

[[module.success c.cond="module.int_even" c.gte="i:88123"/]]
Result:[module.success c.cond="module.int_even" c.gte="i:88123"/]

[[module.success c.cond="module.lapp_id" c.lte="n:5000"/]]
Result:(Invalid Comparison)[module.success c.cond="module.lapp_id" c.lte="n:5000"/]

True/False Tests(Bool Check - Casted to Bool)

[[module.success c.true="module.y_bool"/]]
Result:[module.success c.true="module.y_bool"/]
[[module.success c.true="n:5"/]]
Result:[module.success c.true="n:5"/]
[[module.success c.true="b:5"/]]
Result:[module.success c.true="b:5"/]

[[module.success c.false="n:5"/]]
Result:[module.success c.false="n:5"/]
[[module.success c.false="b:5"/]]
Result:[module.success c.false="b:5"/]
[[module.success c.false="module.lapp_id"/]]
Result:[module.success c.false="module.lapp_id"/]

Yes/No Tests(String Check - Casted to String)

[[module.success c.yes='module.lapp_id'/]]
Result:[module.success c.yes='module.lapp_id'/]
[[module.success c.yes='s:yes'/]]
Result:[module.success c.yes='s:yes'/]
[[module.success c.yes='yes'/]]
Result:[module.success c.yes='yes'/]

[[module.success c.no='module.lapp_id'/]]
Result:[module.success c.no='module.lapp_id'/]
[[module.success c.no='s:no'/]]
Result:[module.success c.no='s:no'/]
[[module.success c.no='no'/]]
Result:[module.success c.no='no'/]

Datatype Tests

[[module.success c.arr='module.arrset'/]]
Result:[module.success c.arr='module.arrset'/]

[[module.success c.not_arr='module.arrset'/]]
Result:[module.success c.not_arr='module.arrset'/]

[[module.success c.str='module.x_str'/]]
Result:[module.success c.str='module.x_str'/]

[[module.success c.not_str='module.arrset'/]]
Result:[module.success c.not_str='module.arrset'/]

[[module.success c.bool='module.y_bool'/]]
Result:[module.success c.bool='module.y_bool'/]

[[module.success c.not_bool='module.x_str'/]]
Result:[module.success c.not_bool='module.x_str'/]

[[module.success c.int='module.int_even'/]]
Result:[module.success c.int='module.int_even'/]

[[module.success c.not_int='module.num_odd'/]]
Result:[module.success c.not_int='module.num_odd'/]

[[module.success c.num='module.num_odd'/]]
Result:[module.success c.num='module.num_odd'/]

[[module.success c.not_num='module.num_odd'/]]
Result:[module.success c.not_num='module.num_odd'/]

[[module.success c.obj='module.num_odd'/]]
Result:[module.success c.obj='module.num_odd'/]

[[module.success c.not_obj='module.arrset'/]]
Result:[module.success c.not_obj='module.arrset'/]

Number Checks(Casted to float)

[[module.success c.zero='n:0'/]]
Result:[module.success c.zero='n:0'/]

[[module.success c.positive='module.lapp_id'/]]
Result:[module.success c.positive='module.lapp_id'/]

[[module.success c.negative='module.lapp_id'/]]
Result:[module.success c.negative='module.lapp_id'/]

Whitespace/Not Whitespace Checks(String Check - Casted to String)

[[module.success c.ws='module.whitespaces'/]]
Result:[module.success c.ws='module.whitespaces'/]

[[module.success c.not_ws='module.failed'/]]
Result:[module.success c.not_ws='module.failed'/]

Empty/Not Empty Checks(Empty and Not Empty as defined by PHP)

[[module.success c.empty='module.x_str'/]]
Result:[module.success c.empty='module.x_str'/]

[[module.success c.not_empty='module.arrset'/]]
Result:[module.success c.not_empty='module.arrset'/]

Null/Not Null Checks(Strict Check)

[[module.success c.null='module.x_str'/]]
Result:[module.success c.null='module.x_str'/]
[[module.success c.null='null'/]]
Result:[module.success c.null='null'/]

[[module.success c.not_null='module.arrset'/]]
Result:[module.success c.not_null='module.arrset'/]

Request Exists/Request Not Exists Checks

[[module.success c.request_exists='request.req'/]]
Result:[module.success c.request_exists='request.req'/]
[[module.success c.request_exists='request.s'/]]
Result:[module.success c.request_exists='request.s'/]

[[module.success c.request_not_exists='request.req'/]]
Result:[module.success c.request_not_exists='request.req'/]

Contains/Not Contains Checks(Not strict check, Will not check datatypes)

[[module.success c.contains='s:hello' c.haystack='s:hello,hi,hope' /]]
Result:[module.success c.contains='s:hello' c.haystack='s:hello,hi,hope' /]
[[module.success c.contains='s:hell' c.haystack='module.arrset' /]]
Result:[module.success c.contains='s:hell' c.haystack='module.arrset' /]

[[module.success c.not_contains='s:hello' c.haystack='s:hello,hi,hope' /]]
Result:[module.success c.not_contains='s:hello' c.haystack='s:hello,hi,hope' /]
[[module.success c.not_contains='s:hell' c.haystack='module.arrset' /]]
Result:[module.success c.not_contains='s:hell' c.haystack='module.arrset' /]

Exists/Not Exists Checks(Check against env)

[[module.success c.exists='module.x_str' /]]
Result:[module.success c.exists='module.x_str' /]
[[module.success c.exists='module.x'/]]
Result:[module.success c.exists='module.x' /]

[[module.success c.not_exists='module.x'/]]
Result:[module.success c.not_exists='module.x' /]
[[module.success c.not_exists='module.x_str'/]]
Result:[module.success c.not_exists='module.x_str' /]

User Can/User Cannot Checks(Assumed a string. Use curly braces for Env)

[[module.success c.user_can='administrator' /]]
Result:[module.success c.user_can='administrator' /]

[[module.success c.user_cannot='subscriber'/]]
Result:[module.success c.user_cannot='subscriber' /]

Logged In/Not Logged In Checks(Right hand side is irrelevant but must exist)

[[module.success c.logged_in='yes' /]]
Result:[module.success c.logged_in='yes' /]

[[module.success c.not_logged_in='yes'/]]
Result:[module.success c.not_logged_in='yes' /]

Device Checks(comma separated string)

[[module.success c.device='s:desktop' /]]
Result:[module.success c.device='s:desktop' /]

[[module.success c.device='s:tablet,mobile'/]]
Result:[module.success c.device='s:tablet,mobile' /]

And Checks

[[module.success c.device='s:desktop' and.logged_in='yes' /]]
Result:[module.success c.device='s:desktop' and.logged_in='yes' /]

Or Checks

[[module.success c.device='s:desktop' or.exists='module.x_str' /]]
Result:[module.success c.device='s:desktop' or.exists='module.x_str' /]

[/templates.add]

item.title: debugging-samples
item.dc:creator: amit
item.content:encoded:
[module.set x="i am X" /] [module.set xd="i am XD" /] [template.set xt="i am XT" /]

Using ECHO ^^

[env.echo module.x /] [env.module.x.echo /] [module.echo x /] [module.x.echo /] [template.echo xt /] [template.xt.echo /]

Using DUMP

[env.dump module.x /] [env.module.x.dump /] [module.dump x /] [module.x.dump /] [template.dump xt /] [template.xt.dump /] [templates.add test] [template.set msg="i am message" /] [template.echo msg /] [template.return template.msg /] [/templates.add] //**[templates.test /]**//

o.echo

[module.x o.echo=t /]

o.dump

[module.x o.dump=t /] [template.xt /]

o.log

[module.x o.log=1 /] [debug.ignore]

o.exit

[module.x o.exit=t /] [template.xt o.exit=1 /]

o.die

[module.xd o.die=1 /] [module.x /] [/debug.ignore]

item.title: sample-shortcode
item.dc:creator: amit
item.content:encoded:
[wp.get option.blogname c.logged_in='yes' m.upper=yes o.set=module.x /]
[module.set x="i am X" c.request_exists='override'/]
[module.x o.dump=t ]

item.title: get-set-example
item.dc:creator: amit
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main]
[env.set module.x="i am X" /] [module.set xd="i am XD" /]
[template.set xt="i am XT" /] [templates.run test o.set='template.y' /]
[php.substr p1='abcdef' p2='1' o.set='template.st'/] [php.substr p1='abcdef' p2="1" p3="3" /] [env.dump /]
[/templates.add]
[templates.add test] [template.echo xt /] [module.echo xd /] [template.set xt="i am XT OF Templates" /] [template.return template.xt /] [/templates.add]

item.title: register-post-tax
item.dc:creator: amit
item.content:encoded:
Registering Custom Post Types, Taxonomies, Menu Positions, Less Variables, Rewrite Rules

  1. Custom Post Types
    1. Short Approach
    2. Long Approach
  2. Taxonomies
  3. Menu Positions
  4. Less Variables
  5. Custom Rewrite Rules
[debug.ignore]

Custom Post Types

Short Approach

[post_types.add test_works singular_name='Testing CPT' plural_name='TESTINGS' /]

Long Approach

[template.set singular_label='Form Entry' /] [template.set plural_label='Form Entries' /] [register.post slug='as_entries'] { "label" : "[template.get plural_label /]", "public" : true, "exclude_from_search":true, "publicly_queryable":true, "show_in_nav_menus":false, "show_ui" : true, "show_in_menu" : true, "capability_type" : "post", "map_meta_cap" : true, "rewrite" : { "slug":"entry_type", "with_front":false }, "hierarchical" : false, "query_var" : true, "supports" : [ "title","editor","page-attributes","custom-fields" ], "labels" : { "name" : "[template.get plural_label /]", "singular_name" : "[template.get singular_label /]", "menu_name" : "[template.get plural_label /]", "add_new" : "Add [template.get singular_label /]", "add_new_item" : "Add New [template.get singular_label /]", "edit" : "Edit", "edit_item" : "Edit [template.get singular_label /]", "new_item" : "New [template.get singular_label /]", "view" : "View [template.get singular_label /]", "view_item" : "View [template.get singular_label /]", "search_items" : "Search [template.get plural_label /]", "not_found" : "No [template.get plural_label /] Found", "not_found_in_trash" : "No [template.get plural_label /] Found in Trash", "parent" : "Parent [template.get singular_label /]" } } [/register.post]

Taxonomies

[template.set singular_label='Form Entry Type' /] [template.set plural_label='Form Entry Types' /] [register.taxonomy slug='entries_type' post_type='as_entries'] { "label" : "[template.get plural_label /]", "hierarchical" : true, "show_ui":true, "show_admin_column":false, "show_in_nav_menus":false, "query_var" : true, "rewrite" : { "slug":"entry_type", "with_front":false }, "labels" : { "name" : "[template.get plural_label /]", "singular_name" : "[template.get singular_label /]", "menu_name" : "[template.get plural_label /]", "add_new" : "Add [template.get singular_label /]", "add_new_item" : "Add New [template.get singular_label /]", "edit" : "Edit", "edit_item" : "Edit [template.get singular_label /]", "new_item" : "New [template.get singular_label /]", "view" : "View [template.get singular_label /]", "view_item" : "View [template.get singular_label /]", "search_items" : "Search [template.get plural_label /]", "not_found" : "No [template.get plural_label /] Found" } } [/register.taxonomy]

Menu Positions

[register.menu_location] { "tutorial-menu":"Tutorial Menu", "tutorial-menu-top":"Tutorial Menu Top" } [/register.menu_location]

Less Variables

[register.less_variables] @custom-primary: #ff5722; @custom-white: #efefef; [/register.less_variables] Custom Rewrite rules [register.rewrite_rule] { "regex":"myparamname/([a-z0-9-]+)[/]?$", "redirect": "index.php?myparamname=$matches[ 1 ]", "after":"top" } [/register.rewrite_rule] [/debug.ignore]
